Name: Donut Arena
About the game: Donut Arena is a gladiatorial action roguelite. Choose the arena that best fits the current situation you find yourself in, earn combat items by hyping the crowd in different possible ways, control the king's mood to avoid being punished and conquer underwears as you progress to become more powerful and reach the highest scores. Game objective: reach the highest scores by eating lots of donuts. For that, you should be surprised with the amount of possibilities.â€‹ Be creative! Gameplay Features Complex combat with lots of possibilities Countless strategies and builds to try out Reach the 0.1% best scores to earn the PRO title Leaderboard to compare your highest score with friends Full controller support Beginner Tips The crowd drops armor and helmets in the easiest arena Press ESC to learn about the new items you discover Throwing is safer than striking, it doesn't slow you down Try different sequences of underwears Join the Discord to discuss about the game:
